title: Antarctica
creator_credit: Bastian Wimmer, Clayton J. Edwards and Image Associates
brief_description: Examines some of the significant research projects being carried out in Antartica under the auspices of the National Science Foundation. Shows how these projects relate to worldwide concerns and emphasizes the cooperation of American scientists with those from other countries.
creator_credit_for_label: Bastian Wimmer, Clayton J. Edwards and Image Associates
